description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the ape participants - usually numerical
type of apparatus used in a given session – 1(easiest) / 2/ 3(hardest)
the time the apparatus was baited – min’ sec”
the time the participant retrieved required number of grapes or when the session time elapsed – min’ sec”
the number of times finger was used as the technique to retrieve the grape
the number of times lifting was used as the technique to retrieve the grape
the number of times shooting was used as the technique to retrieve the grape
the technique with which the participant successfully retrieved the grapes - finger/ lift/ shoot / no success
